entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thundershowers early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
